1.name: Foundation Enhancement
deliverables: Component Extraction: FormInput, DataTable, LoadingSpinner, ErrorMessage, Card
Type Safety: Comprehensive TypeScript interfaces and database types
Custom Hooks: useIncome, useLocalStorage, useDebounce for data operations
Enhanced Data Layer: Supabase client with retry logic and validation utilities
Testing Infrastructure: Jest, React Testing Library, and Playwright E2E setup
Error Handling: ErrorBoundary component with graceful error recovery
Performance: Loading skeletons and optimized component structure
Accessibility: ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support
Documentation: Component documentation and usage guidelines

2.name: User Experience Improvements
deliverables: Enhanced Dashboard: Filtering, search, sorting, and pagination system
Improved Forms: Real-time validation with enhanced FormInput component
Auto-save Functionality: Draft saving and restoration for income forms
Mobile Responsiveness: Touch-friendly interfaces and safe area support
PWA Features: Service worker, offline support, installable app manifest
Navigation Improvements: Active states, breadcrumbs, keyboard shortcuts
User Onboarding: Interactive tour system for new users
Help System: Tooltips and contextual help throughout the application

3.name: Data Management & Analytics
deliverables: Analytics Dashboard: Comprehensive income analysis with summaries and trends
Visual Charts: Chart.js integration with bar charts, line charts, and trend analysis
Calendar Heatmap: GitHub-style activity visualization for income tracking
Data Export: Multi-format export (CSV, JSON, PDF) with customizable options
Data Import: CSV import with validation, duplicate detection, and error handling
Backup & Restore: Complete data management with integrity checking
Advanced Reporting: Custom date ranges and filtering for detailed analysis
Date Range Selector: Flexible date picking with preset options
Navigation Updates: Added Analytics and Data Management menu items
Test Coverage: Comprehensive tests for all new analytics and data management functionality
